name: Darkest Timeline
description:
Best friends Moose and Neph are just trying to live their daily lives, but a letter from their alternate selves reveals that their cozy little life could be about to take a dark turn. Delve through the Crystal Caverns and Space Forest with our heroes as they meet themselves and try to stop these dark events before they can happen.

Can you find all the endings? Discover both Moose's and Neph's three main endings plus those bonus bad ends sprinkled throughout! 

Darkest Timeline is an ambitious love child of a project for Vtubers Nephalope and ThatDernMoose.

Find Moose here:

https://twitter.com/ThatDernMoose

Find Neph here:

https://www.nephalope.com/

Music & Sound provided by:

winepot.

https://linktr.ee/winepot
